Install TOP R package
---------------------
```{r installation, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("kevinlkx/TOP")
```

Load TOP R package
------------------
```{r setup, eval = FALSE}
library(TOP)
```
